content:
TASK: Craft an item of type: lapis_block
inventory=[{"type": "iron_ore", "quantity": 18, "index": 13}, {"type": "stripped_crimson_hyphae", "quantity": 24, "index": 27}, {"type": "vine", "quantity": 45, "index": 33}, {"type": "dragon_head", "quantity": 1, "index": 37}, {"type": "lapis_lazuli", "quantity": 9, "index": 45}]
thought: To craft a lapis block, I need to place 9 lapis lazuli in a 3x3 grid. Therefore I will move the first lapis lazuli to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 45 to slot 1 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: lapis_block
inventory=[{"type": "blue_dye", "quantity": 1, "index": 0}, {"type": "lapis_lazuli", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "iron_ore", "quantity": 18, "index": 13}, {"type": "stripped_crimson_hyphae", "quantity": 24, "index": 27}, {"type": "vine", "quantity": 45, "index": 33}, {"type": "dragon_head", "quantity": 1, "index": 37}, {"type": "lapis_lazuli", "quantity": 8, "index": 45}]

thought: Now that I have moved all nine lapis lazuli into the crafting grid, I can craft the lapis block by moving it from the crafting slot (0) to a free inventory slot (eg., 11).
Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 11 with quantity 1
